name: 2omb
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: 2omb is an incentive-oriented, high yield algorithmic stablecoin protocol that utilizes seigniorage mechanisms to bring $2OMB to a 1:1 price peg with Fantom.
